content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column]

Get Your Repair Started

Choose your repair

Smartphone Repair

Services

We can do the majority of cell phone repairs like screen, battery, charging port and motherboard repairs. i have listed some common repairs that we receive, if you wish to be quoted for a specific repair please click on the contact us page and send a brief description of the issue and the model of the device for a proper quote.

Learn more

Tablet Repair

Services

At TechFix we fix all models of tablets. We repair Apple iPad Tablets (iPad, iPad Mini, iPad Air, iPad Pro), Asus Tablets (Transformer Tablet), Amazon Tablets (Kindle Fire, Kindle Fire HD, Kindle Fire HDX), Toshiba Tablets (Thrive), Acer Tablets(Acer Aspire, Acer Iconia) and other models.

Learn more

Laptop Repair

Services

we can fix most laptop issues from hardware upgrades and replacements to complete OS repairs and cloning to SSD for faster performance.

Learn more
[vc_empty_space alter_height=”large” hide_on_desktop=”” hide_on_notebook=”” hide_on_tablet=”” hide_on_mobile=”” css=”.vc_custom_1508316798334{margin-top: 0.75rem !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” hide_bg_image_on_tablet=”” hide_bg_image_on_mobile=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1509280137208{background: #f4f4f4 url(http://thetechfixers.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/bg-repair.jpg?id=331) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space alter_height=”huge” hide_on_desktop=”” hide_on_notebook=”” hide_on_tablet=”” hide_on_mobile=”” css=”.vc_custom_1508316908257{margin-top: -0.25rem !important;}”]

Cracked Screen?

Is shattered glass clouding the screen of your phone, tablet or laptop? Cell phone cracked screens can make it difficult to complete even the simplest of tasks.

Our technicians have the knowledge and expertise to fix screens on devices of all makes and models .

[vc_empty_space hide_on_desktop=”” hide_on_notebook=”” hide_on_tablet=”” hide_on_mobile=”” css=”.vc_custom_1508317155380{margin-top: 0.05rem !important;}”]Get a Free Estimate[vc_empty_space alter_height=”huge” hide_on_desktop=”” hide_on_notebook=”” hide_on_tablet=”” hide_on_mobile=”” css=”.vc_custom_1508317180500{margin-top: 0.3rem !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
